name: angelo:HOME_Jules_Water_Blue_Lilly_Armless_Chair_(Set_of_2)
reviews: Good looking chairs, very true to the provided picture. Extremely simple to assemble as well.

These chairs were delivered in just a few days. I do like the print and the colors. But, when putting them together the legs were not even or level. We had to make adjustments and add spacers to the legs.
Exactly what I hoped for. Couldn't be more pleased.
Easy to assemble arrived really fast! thanks

Simple, attractive and comfortable chairs. Fabric and design are great, tool less than 10 minutes to put together and they look and feel terrific. Probably not for you if your BMI is over 30, but great for normal-sized people and kids. A great value and highly functional.
description: This set of two angelo:HOME Jules armless accent chairs are covered in a woven floral fabric with a background color of ivory accented in shades of turquoise blue, cinnamon rust, silvery sage green and dark brown. The set includes two armless chairs with a curved square back, sinuous springs and a thick foam cushion for extraordinary comfort. Perfect for the living room, dining room or office decor, the scale of this chair coordinates well in any room environment.Set includes: Two (2) chairsDesigned by Angelo Surmelis, creator of a new generation of Modern Classic furniture that combines modern lines with traditional detailsEco-friendly and efficient product design uses less fossil fuel based components in construction and deliveryVarious components are recyclable at the end of useEasy assembly requiredUpholstery color: Ivory accented in shades of turquoise blue, cinnamon rust, silvery sage green and dark brownFinish: Dark brownMaterial: PolyesterFurniture pattern: FloralStyle: TransitionalChair back height: StandardFrame materials: Engineered mixed hardwood frame construction for added strengthDimensions (overall): 33.5 inches high x 22 inches wide x 31 inches deepSeat: 18.5 inches high x 22 inches wide x 19 inches deepStyleTransitionalMaterialPolyesterChair TypeAccent Chairs, SetsAssemblyAssembly RequiredChair Back HeightStandardColorBlue, Brown, Off-White, OrangeFurniture PatternFloral
